name: Paracetamol
description: Paracetamol (also known as Acetaminophen) is a commonly used over-the-counter medication for relieving mild to moderate pain and reducing fever.

name: Aspirin
description: Aspirin is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to reduce pain, inflammation, and fever, and to prevent blood clots.

name: Azithromycin
description: Azithromycin is an antibiotic used to treat various bacterial infections, including respiratory, skin, and ear infections.

name: Cetirizine
description: Cetirizine is a non-drowsy antihistamine that relieves allergy symptoms like sneezing, itchy eyes, and hives.

name: Cofsils Cough Syrup
description: Cofsils Cough Syrup soothes throat irritation and provides quick relief from cough and cold symptoms.

name: Calpol
description: Calpol relieves fever and mild to moderate pain, making it suitable for both children and adults.
